content: Our paper "A Novel Vision-based Approach to Test Sequence Generation for Mobile GUI Testing" has been accepted by IEEE Transactions on Reliability.

Our TSE paper "Toward Cost-effective Adaptive Random Testing: An Approximate Nearest Neighbor Approach" has been accepted by the Journal-First Track of the 40th IEEE/ACM International Conference on Automated Software Engineering (ASE 2025).

Our TOSEM paper "Large Language Models for Automated Web-Form-Test Generation: An Empirical Study" has been accepted by the Journal-First Track of the 40th IEEE/ACM International Conference on Automated Software Engineering (ASE 2025).
Our paper "Adaptive Random Testing of Deep Learning Systems Using Image Hashing" has been accepted by IEEE Transactions on Reliability.
Our paper "Ribonucleic-Acid Protein Interaction Prediction Based on Deep Learning: A Comprehensive Survey" has been accepted by Applied Soft Computing.
Our paper "Large Language Models for Automated Web-Form-Test Generation: An Empirical Study" has been accepted by ACM Transactions on Software Engineering and Methodology (TOSEM).
Our paper "Applying Lexicographical Ordering to Software Product Line Testing" has been accepted by IEEE Transactions on Reliability.
